author: Nintendo of America
description:
MARVEL Cosmic Invasion launches Dec 1, 2025 on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/marvel-cosmic-invasion-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01   

War spreads amongst the stars, but fire and life incarnate still prevail! 
 
An X-Men formerly known as Marvel Girl uses her massive telekinetic powers to crush the insectoid invaders, but that is not all: The flames of the Phoenix are ready to consume all manners of evil. 
 
Bug soldiers, better beware: the Invincible Iron Man has also joined the battle! Whether it’s firing mighty repulsor blasts or powering up the Iron Cannon, Tony Stark’s jet-powered alter ego brings all of his technological might to Annihilus’ doorstep. 

#MARVELCosmicInvasion #NintendoSwitch #NintendoSwitch2 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.
title: MARVEL Cosmic Invasion – Release Date Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2

description:

author: Nintendo of America
description:
A free software update for the Pikmin 4 game will be available this November. An updated free demo of the main game will also be available on Nintendo eShop the same day. 

https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/pikmin-4-switch/?utm_source=Other&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=N0099-02&utm_id=N0099-02

A free update is blooming in Pikmin 4! Take photos on your adventure with the new Field Camera, enjoy an easier or harder journey with two new Creature Activity Levels, and find the elusive Decor Pikmin, who can also join you in the smart device app, Pikmin Bloom!


Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: Pikmin 4 – Update Overview – Nintendo Switch

author: Nintendo of America
description: Something invisible might be behind the mystery. Watch these two videos played back-to-back to reveal the truth.
title: Pikmin Close to you – Nintendo

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Mariooo, where are you?

One day, Luigi received the unexpected news that he'd won a huge mansion! Overjoyed, he called up Mario and invited him to celebrate the exciting news. But after arriving at the mansion and searching for Mario, who should have arrived first, Luigi is attacked by a ghost! After being saved from danger by Professor E. Gadd, Luigi expresses his panic that Mario is nowhere to be found. Luckily for Luigi, this professor has the perfect tools for the occasion! Now, armed with the Poltergust 3000 and a Game Boy™ Horror gifted by the professor, Luigi must explore the frightening mansion to find Mario in this action adventure game originally released for the Nintendo GameCube™ system in 2001. Shine your flashlight on ghosts to surprise them, then suck them up with the Poltergust 3000. When ghosts try to run away, the trick is to quickly tilt the stick in the opposite direction and back again repeatedly to weaken them.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.d
title: Luigi’s Mansion – Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics
